synthesis_conditions.framework: honeycomb channels with a Mg2+-format backbone
chirality_features: RR-cam acts as an auxiliary ligand attached on the wall of the hexagonal channel
synthesis_conditions.topology: chiral eta net with Mg-HCOO helices (31 or 32)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The absolute helicity of chain is controlled by the stereochemistry around C1 of camphorates

chirality_features: Diastereoisomerization of the chiral linker (transition from cis RS-cam to trans RR-cam) results in greater structural diversity
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The relative orientation between adjacent metal nodes is affected, leading to various framework types

synthesis_conditions.framework: V-shaped cobalt dimers connected by eight RR-cam to form the ecu net

topology.name: CPM-331-RS
topology.type: rob topology with the wavy sheet

topology.name: CPM-332-RR
topology.type: pcu topology with the flat sheet

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: CPM-332-RR has a BET surface area of about 216.02 m2 g@1 while CPM-331-RS is 16.43 m2 g@1
